content.raw:
@mlibbrecht oddly there was some merge conflicts still but I've fixed them as well as fixed reported errors from Pyflakes. Notably I removed `last_window` in `queue_train_bundle` since it wasn't used. Is this correct?

I also ran simpleseg and found that test did not pass. Notably in the parameters to GMTK when running gmtkEMTrain this change outputs "-loadAccRange 0" instead of an expected "-loadAccRange 0:0". I'm 99% certain these are functionally equivalent - can you confirm?
content.html:
@mlibbrecht oddly there was some merge conflicts still but I've fixed them as well as fixed reported errors from Pyflakes. Notably I removed last_window in queue_train_bundle since it wasn't used. Is this correct?

I also ran simpleseg and found that test did not pass. Notably in the parameters to GMTK when running gmtkEMTrain this change outputs "-loadAccRange 0" instead of an expected "-loadAccRange 0:0". I'm 99% certain these are functionally equivalent - can you confirm?
